DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the registry is to assess workload of a Home Monitoring based follow up for Biotronik ICD and CRTD patients.
DOC.brief_title: Sheba Medical Center Home Monitoring Clinic Registry
DOC.criteria: Approved indication for ICD or CRTD Implanted with or replaced with a Biotronik Lumax device Patient willing and able to sign consent form Willing and able to attend clinic visits and follow up schedule Transmission of more than 80% at 3month follow up Patient older than 18 years no indication for ICD or CRTD implant Life expectancy shorter than 12 months Pregnancy Participation in other clinical studies
